headline.main: Adding Tones To Color Film; Stains or Cellophane Used to Alter or Modify Prints And Transparencies

lead_paragraph: For the first fifty years -- and color photography is that old and older -- the workers in color bent their energies toward the most accurate rendition of color as it occurs in nature. In their older forms, Lumiere, Finlaycolor, the early bi-packs and tri-packs were difficult and unpredictable at best.
abstract: Historic, War and Patriotic Home Movies (Official Films amateur film)
